00032 class tx_x4epibase_pi1_wizicon {
00033         function proc($wizardItems)     {
00034                 global $LANG;
00035 
00036                 $LL = $this->includeLocalLang();
00037 
00038                 $wizardItems['plugins_tx_x4epibase_pi1'] = array(
00039                         'icon'=>t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath('x4epibase').'pi1/ce_wiz.gif',
00040                         'title'=>$LANG->getLLL('pi1_title',$LL),
00041                         'description'=>$LANG->getLLL('pi1_plus_wiz_description',$LL),
00042                         'params'=>'&defVals[tt_content][CType]=list&defVals[tt_content][list_type]=x4epibase'
00043                 );
00044 
00045                 return $wizardItems;
00046         }
00047         function includeLocalLang()     {
00048                 include(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('x4epibase').'locallang.php');
00049                 return $LOCAL_LANG;
00050         }
00051 }
